item.description:
Lets's go watch 'Indoor/Outdoor' written by Kenny Finkle and directed by K.J. Cowan of Virginia at Greeley Park.

In this unabashedly sentimental comedy, a cat named Samantha (Artistic Director Suzanne Delle) has just started living with a guy named Shuman (Eric Skoglund of Manchester, NH) who she believes is her true love; however, things become problematic when one night Oscar (Bradley Brinkley of South Carolina), a sexy alley cat shows up at the sliding glass door. Suddenly Samantha begins to wonder whether she's an indoor cat or an outdoor cat.

Also featuring Maria Barry of Nashua, 'Indoor/Outdoor' is an allegory about the difficulties and joys of all manner of relationships.

Sponsored by the Cat Doctor of Nashua, the Ella F. Anderson Trust, the Arthur Getz Trust, and the City of Nashua. Indoor/Outdoor is part of Nashua's Summer Fun Activities and the August 11th Gate City Cyclone event

The play starts at 7:30 PM, but we need to be there by 6:30 to get good seats. You need to bring a lawn chair, bug spray and snacks as desired.

Look for Robert. I will have a silver foil balloon.
item.name: Free Play: Indoor/Outdoor
